snippet: The Montana Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that the original sentence for a former high school teacher who served one month in prison for raping a 14-year-old student was too short.
abstract: Stacey Dean Rambold, former high school teacher who served one month in prison for raping 14-year-old student, faces more time behind bars after the Montana Supreme Court rules that his original sentence was too short.
lead_paragraph: The Montana Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that the original sentence for a former high school teacher who served one month in prison for raping a 14-year-old student was too short.

headline.main: Montana: Resentencing Ordered in Rape Case
headline.print_headline: Montana: Resentencing Ordered in Rape Case
